Welcome to Link Rot, a weekly discussion about whats happening in life, technology and the way they intersect and interact. At the moment we're testing the format, technology and process sand will be ironing out issues in the coming weeks so bear with us! We'd always appreciate your feedback and you can get in touch with us on email or on twitter!
